gameObject

Class OtherSonic

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameObject.GameObject
      • gameObject.Unit
        • gameObject.Sonic
          • gameObject.OtherSonic

  • public class OtherSonic
extends Sonic
    Represents the other Sonics shown during multiplayer

                  ImageManager imageManager)
        The general constructor used to create other Sonics
        Parameters:
        userID - The string ID of other users
        multiplayerInfo - The multiplayer information shared between the server and the client
        imageManager - A hashmap containing all of the sprite animations
